short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your study experience with AI: Instant answers, deep insights, and personalized learning across subjects.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to guesswork, struggling with difficult problems, and juggling multiple tabs to find answers. Introducing Transcript, the ultimate study companion powered by advanced artificial intelligence. Receive instant answers, explanations, and relevant resources for any question.

Why choose Transcript? 🤔

🖥️ Seamless User Interface
Dive into a sleek, user-friendly interface designed for efficiency. Created by students who understand your needs, it ensures essential information and resources are right at your fingertips for a focused and optimized study experience.

🔍 Instant Solutions
Ever stuck on a tough question or want to check your work? Get help from your AI sidekick without expensive tutors or time-consuming research. Instantly access accurate answers, detailed explanations, and related resources for any question.

🎓 Any Subject, Any Level
Transcript is designed to provide personalized guidance on any subject, regardless of difficulty. It’s tailored to assist with multiple choice, math, select-all-that-apply, short and long answer, visual questions, and more!

💡 Knowledge Reinforcement
Build your understanding with detailed, step-by-step explanations for any question. Chat with AI to ask follow-up questions, clarify doubts, and master concepts. Use your voice to converse with AI for hands-free exploration of topics, enhancing accessibility and providing a personalized learning experience.

🤖 Artificial Intelligence
Transcript’s advanced AI exceeds the capabilities of Chat GPT-4, providing unparalleled accuracy and performance in answering your questions.

🌍 Universal Compatibility
Bring your study companion anywhere you go across the web. Whether you're researching, browsing articles, or exploring new ideas, Transcript provides accurate information and support on any webpage.

📝 Notebook
Upload your notes, lectures, and study materials all in one place, enabling AI to provide context-aware assistance when solving questions.

How To Use 📚
1️⃣ Install the extension: Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to the toolbar.
2️⃣ Log In: Sign in to your account.
3️⃣ Ways to Search:
🖱️ Text Selection: Highlight any text and press the "Solve Question" button.
📸 Snapshot: Press Cmd/Ctrl+Shift+1, then click and drag to initiate a search.

Join over 100,000+ satisfied students who have discovered the power of instant learning with our revolutionary chrome extension. Install it now to elevate your learning journey! 🧠
